articles.title: Death toll passes 900 after devastating Indonesia floods - BBC
articles.description: More than 100,000 homes were destroyed when powerful rains lashed the South East Asian country last week.
articles.content:
The death toll in Indonesia from recent flooding has passed 900, with hundreds still missing.
More than 100,000 homes were destroyed when a rare and powerful cyclone formed over the Malaca Strait la… [+2222 chars]
